org.drip.product.common
Class Component

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.product.common.Component
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentMarketParamRef
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalibratableComponent
public abstract class Component
extends Serializer
implements ComponentMarketParamRef

This abstract class extends ComponentMarketParamRef. Provides methods for getting the component’s notional, coupon, effective date, maturity date, coupon amount, and list of coupon periods.
